get.description: Returns this OpenAPI specification
Get information about public beaches.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Filter the returned properties per entry

name.description: The name of this beach

waterquality.description: The most recent water quality value

description.example: Slädavikens havsbad är en badstrand belägen på den östra sidan av Alnön, öppen maj-augusti.

source.description: The source of the data for this beach

waterquality.description: The most recent water quality value

description.example: Slädavikens havsbad är en badstrand belägen på den östra sidan av Alnön, öppen maj-augusti.

get.description: Get information about a single beach.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Beach to retrieve

name.description: The name of this beach

description.example: Bergafjärden i Njurunda är ett havsbad med 800 m fin sandstrand och långgrunt, vilket gör att den passar bra för familjer med barn. Butik och servering, grillplats, minigolf, lekplats och toalett finns vid stranden. Bergafjärden är öppet maj-september och vattenprover tas. Badet ligger vid Bergafjärdens camping.

waterquality.description: An array of water quality observations, sorted in reversed historical order

weather.description: An array of weather observations, sorted in reversed historical order

windDirection.description: The wind direction expressed in decimal degrees compared to geographic North (measured clockwise).

windSpeed.description: The observed wind speed in m/s.

get.description: Get information about ongoing or planned cityworks

id.description: The ID of this citywork instance

get.description: Get information about a specific citywork instance

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the citywork to retrieve

id.description: The ID of this citywork instance

description.description: A description containing a reason, and contact information about this citywork instance

get.description: Get information about published exercise trails

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: Filter the returned trails by category

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Filter the returned properties per entry

id.description: The ID of this exercise trail

name.description: The name of this exercise trail
The name of the owner of this exercise trail
The name of the manager of this exercise trail

length.description: The length of this trail in kilometers

difficulty.description: A difficulty rating in the range [0.0 1.0] where 0 is easy and 1 is very hard

paymentRequired.description: A value determining if payment is required to use the trail

publicAccess.description: Information about when/if this trail is open for the public

status.description: The status of this exercise trail

name.description: The name of the owner of this exercise trail
The name of the manager of this exercise trail

length.description: The length of this trail in kilometers

difficulty.description: A difficulty rating in the range [0.0 1.0] where 0 is easy and 1 is very hard

paymentRequired.description: A value determining if payment is required to use the trail

publicAccess.description: Information about when/if this trail is open for the public

status.description: The status of this exercise trail

get.description: Get information on a single published exercise trail

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the exercise trail to be retrieved

id.description: The ID of this exercise trail

name.description: The name of this exercise trail
The name of the owner of this exercise trail
The name of the manager of this exercise trail

status.description: The status of this exercise trail

difficulty.description: A difficulty rating in the range [0.0 1.0] where 0 is easy and 1 is very hard

paymentRequired.description: A value determining if payment is required to use the trail

publicAccess.description: Information about when/if this trail is open for the public

source.description: The source of this exercise trail

get.description: Get published reports from stratsys.se.

get.description:
Get temperature values from a given sensor.

Available sensors are returned from the /temperature/air/sensors endpoint.

parameters.name: sensor
parameters.description: ID of the temperature sensor to query.

parameters.name: timeAt
parameters.description: Select temperatures from time

parameters.name: endTimeAt
parameters.description: Select temperatures up to time

parameters.name: aggrMethods
parameters.description: Select aggregation methods. (options MUST be set to aggregatedValues)

parameters.name: aggrPeriodDuration
parameters.description: Select aggregation period. (options MUST be set to aggregatedValues)
